article_title: Since Obamacare Passed 50 Months Ago, Healthcare Has Gained Almost 1 Million Jobs

article_metadata.author: Dan Diamond

og.description: Obamacare was once called "The Job-Killing Health Care Law." But the latest jobs report suggests that the broader economy—and the health care sector, specifically—is adding jobs at a healthy rate. Since the Affordable Care Act was signed into law in March 2010, the health care industry has gained nearly 1 million [...]
